requirements.summary: Publish the existing Draft Version 15 frontend build to live/production without introducing any feature/UI changes.
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed/live environment runs the exact same code and assets as Draft Version 15 (no additional commits/changes introduced solely for publishing).
The application loads successfully in the live environment and users can navigate to the existing routes: / (login), /team, and /admin.
The leading-team/bid highlight animation present in the draft remains present in the live deployment.

file_operations.description: Add a release checklist documenting how to deploy the already-built Draft Version 15 frontend to production (e.g., confirm the exact source revision/build artifacts, run a smoke test that visits /, /team, and /admin, and visually confirm the leading-team highlight animation remains intact). Ensure the document emphasizes no code or asset modifications are required for publishing.
